sentences.en: The agency has been vilified by some doctors for being unnecessarily slow to approve life-saving drugs.
sentences.cn: 该机构因对救生药物的审批速度过慢而备受一些医生的诽谤。

sentences.en: There is a new chance to learn another life-saving ability.
sentences.cn: 现在有机会学习另一种拯救生命的技能。

sentences.en: Why not just take this chance to learn one more life-saving ability?
sentences.cn: 为什么不抓住这个机会多学一项救生技能呢？
